Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Hillary Clinton wants to bring in thousands of refugees to America from all around the world without any kind of security screening. The expert's verdict clarifies that while Clinton does want to allow refugees into America, the idea that there will be no security screening is incorrect.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at times.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that Hillary Clinton wants to bring in thousands of refugees without security screening.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that Hillary Clinton wants to bring in refugees without any kind of security screening, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
